Oct. 7, 2006 D West Wales BBA Contest (First Section)
West Wales BBA Festival Contest (First Section) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Wales BBA Festival Contest west-wales-bba-festival-contest-first-section
None
Ammanford, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Nigel Thomas, Euphonium (Newbridge (Celynen) Band) Prizes - 1st £180, 2nd £125, 3rd £110. 5 bands competed.
July 20, 2010, 4:14 p.m. July 4, 2020, 8:41 a.m.
1 Newbridge Celynen Band Paul Holland The Essence of Time
2 Markham and District Band Mike Faro Tallis Variations
3 Rogerstone Band Gareth Hann Lorenzo
4 Pontardulais Town Band Paul Jenkins Coventry Variations
5 RAF St. Athan Voluntary Band Alan Bourne Les Preludes [arr. Gay]
6 Lewis Merthyr Band Lyndon Price Variations on Laudate Dominum
